properties.areaDesc: Bibb, AL; Perry, AL; Dallas, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 8:49AM CST until February 8 at 6:27AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Cahaba River At Centreville Affecting Bibb...Dallas and Perry
Counties.

.Heavy rainfall of three to four inches has occurred over the
upper Cahaba River basin...and a flood warning is now in effect for
the Cahaba River at Centreville.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Cahaba River At Centreville.
* from this evening to Saturday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  8:15 AM Thursday The stage Was 7.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 23 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by tonight and continue to rise
to near 25.9 feet by Friday morning. The river will fall below
flood stage by Friday evening .
* Impact...At 23 feet...Pasture lands begin to flood in the
Centreville area.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
